summary.name: Brandon Liao

discrepancies.notes: PDF shows 1:26.682, JSON shows 1:26.582 - 0.1 second difference. Likely transcription error in shorttracklive.info data.

summary.notes: 1000m time mismatch: JSON=1:26.582 vs PDF=1:26.682 (0.1s difference)

discrepancy_list.likely_cause: Transcription error - PDF is official source, likely correct

conclusions: All 10 athletes confirmed present in USS official PDF
8 athletes have exact time matches between sources
2 athletes (Julius Kazanecki, Justin Liu) have rank-only data in JSON, verified presence in PDF
1 athlete (Brandon Liao) has minor 0.1s time discrepancy - likely transcription error in shorttracklive.info
Overall data quality is HIGH - 91.7% exact match rate for available times
USS PDF is authoritative source; shorttracklive.info generally accurate with minor exceptions
